TopicTitle: What is going on with Ksp Enhanced eddition??

Articles.Content: Hi guys just wondering if anyone has discovered a fix for the ps5 version of the game. I just downloaded the ps5 version after my main save on ps4 became unrecoverable, only to be met with the game not even launching when you press start new game? Am I at fault here or have the devs really done a doosie and put out a halfbaked game you can't even launch. I'm already mad about my 100+ crafts disappearing into the void let alone not being able to launch my native version. There must be a fix please help me!!!
I regret to inform you that work on KSP1 concluded a while back and currently the fate of KSP2 is in doubt.
